subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka’s start against the Los Angeles Dodgers  provided a glimpse of what might have been for the Dodgers, one of the teams that entered the Matsuzaka sweepstakes in November.
snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka’s start against the Los Angeles Dodgers  provided a glimpse of what might have been for the Dodgers, one of the teams that entered the Matsuzaka sweepstakes in November.
